data.eml:eml: Merodoras nheco, new genus and species from Rio Paraguay basin, Brazil (Siluriformes, Doradidae), and nomination of the new subfamily Astrodoradinae.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Horácio Higuchi, José L. O. Birindelli, Leandro M. Sousa, Heraldo A. Britski (2007): Merodoras nheco, new genus and species from Rio Paraguay basin, Brazil (Siluriformes, Doradidae), and nomination of the new subfamily Astrodoradinae. Zootaxa 1446: 31-42, URL: http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:AC82821F-1400-4DA7-AD0E-41D7A2B37BE6
